posts.post_content:
Hey everyone! 

I've got a bunch of T207s for sale/trade.  In trade I am looking to upgrade what I have as I move my entire set towards SGC slabs only.

Happy to send closer pictures of any card as requested.

Shipping with tracking is on me!

Harry Lord Anonymous back (Louisiana) PSA 1 -  $169
John McGraw PSA 1 - $100
Jim Delahanty PSA 1 - $25
Otto Knabe PSA 4 - $100
Elmer Knetzer PSA 1 - $30
Arlie Latham PSA 1 - $25
Clyde Milan PSA 1.5 - $40
William Scanlon PSA 3.5 - $50
Mike Simon PSA 1 - $30
Wallace Smith PSA 3MK - $25
Fred Snodgrass PSA 3MK - $25
Charles Street PSA 3MC - $30
William Sullivan PSA 2 - $45 SOLD
John Warhop PSA 4 - $150
Chief Bender SGC 1 - $100
George Mullin D on cap SGC 4 - $125
Ernest Wilie SGC 3 - $55
are there any with paper loss on back ??
The Lord does.  And the Bender does slightly with some writing as well.
I'll take Sullivan per our emails.
PM sent about the Fred Snodgrass
